original_text: Some of them were looking for a reason to accuse Jesus, so they watched him closely to see if he would heal him on the Sabbath.
korean_text: 사람들이 예수를 고발하려 하여 안식일에 그 사람을 고치시는가 주시하고 있거늘

sentences.original_text: Some of them were looking for a reason
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부는 이유를 찾고 있었다
그래서 그들은 그를 주의 깊게 지켜보았다

sentences.original_text: to see if he would heal him
